text_block_list.text:
Tonight, I'd be attending a party together with Symboli Kris S. 
It was a party held at the same time as the Summer Training camp――

Welcome to the 『Racing Promotional Exchange』. 
Symboli Kris S-sama and one guest. Please, come aboard.
text_block_list.name: Receptionist

text_block_list.text:
――Yeah. 
A learning―― experience. ――Every little bit helps.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
――At the party, there were many notable faces that 
were involved in the Uma Musume Racing world.

Famous trainers with many accolades to their name……the 
author of a book on racing theory that could be 
called mandatory reading……and so on.

Excuse me 
――those two glasses on the right.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Understood. 
……Please enjoy.
text_block_list.name: Waiter

text_block_list.text: ――Trainer. ……Here.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
She took the initiative and acted as escort. 
Maybe she's used to these kinds of places――

And so―― Cheers! 
Everyone, please enjoy the festivities.
text_block_list.name: Party Organizer

text_block_list.text:
――You're, Symboli Kris S-san right? The rumors weren't an 
exaggeration. That race the other day was amazing!
text_block_list.name: Race Official

text_block_list.text:
Thank you. 
――It's an honor.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ……Fufu, the cool-type I see.
text_block_list.name: Race Official

text_block_list.text:
I'm researching the best methods to train Uma Musumes. I'd love 
to hear about the experiences of a first-class runner like you.
text_block_list.name: Race Researcher

text_block_list.text:
Sure. 
……I don't mind.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S was approached by attendees one after the other. 
I decided to watch over her while she mingled for now.

――The number of people approaching her had finally died down. 
After all that talking, she probably wanted something to drink.

Oh…… It's already this late? 
――Well then, give me your hand.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S grabbed my hand and took me to the cafe area. 
Most of the attendees were on the deck, so there were few people.
――If it's here…… we can sit down.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
The summer sky that was visible from the ship was expansive, 
clear, and brilliant. That brilliance was just like――
? ……――What's――so funny?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: I'm glad the party seemed fun

text_block_list.text: ―――――Seemed fun……?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: <size=42>Your eyes were shining like these stars</size>

text_block_list.text:
――The party today…… is an important place. 
A place necessary――to fulfill my mission.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: But that's not the only thing, right?
But that's not the only thing, right?

text_block_list.text:
I had come to understand her. She wasn't defined 
by just her mission…… She could find purpose and 
enjoyment in her own way. At that time too――
『Looks like we found its purpose』
『Looks like we found its purpose』

……That's good. ――……I think…… 
…………that too.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Unsold goods――She was glad we had found their 
purpose. You could read her emotions just by 
noticing the slight changes in her demeanor.

Particularly today, she seemed to be in high spirits. 
She was proactive and had listened intently to 
each attendee that had spoken to her――
choice_data_list: It seemed like you were having fun

text_block_list.text:
――Listening to the pros…… I learned a lot. 
Cutting-edge information―― was useful.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
I need to figure out…… how to use that―― 
information in the future.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: So that next time―― I know what to ask――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ――――……Exciting.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: So I was………… thrilled?――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: You're………… amazing, huh?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: You―― understand my…… emotions.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Those emotions―― that I can't put in to words. 
……Even those emotions―― that I don't―― really understand.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: This―― excitement……
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S, who had desperately been searching 
for the words, suddenly looked directly at me.
For me, that is――――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
…………Nevermind. ――-If it's you, 
you understand…… feelings like these……
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris SSymboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
The corners of her eyes seemed to soften as she looked straight 
at me―― that sparkle, it really did seem like the night sky.

But… 
――……Why is it? …………how do you know……?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S tilted her head slightly. 
Seeing that slightly child-like expression, I couldn't help it――
choice_data_list: You see, I can read minds

text_block_list.text:
――――……Hmmm. 
……that's―― amazing, huh.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
The corners of her mouth raised slightly…… 
It seems like she realized I was joking.
choice_data_list: I can tell just by watching you
I can tell just by watching you

text_block_list.text:
Communicating without words. What she's feeling, 
what she desires, what stirs her heart――

I had sworn to be the one closest to her, 
and to understand her the most.
――――Is that so?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: I see. That's―― great――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
